channel.title: ::starter command
channel.description:
so guys im' trying to add starter command to project czar so i got 2 errors (not in compiler) 1. just ho got owner rights can type but there is no rights on the command 2. if u type ::starter and try type ::starter again it won't work but if u logout and login it will work more 1 time
please help
